title: The Amazon KDP Keyword Research Most Beginners Get Wrong
description:
Keyword research is the backbone of Amazon KDP success, yet it’s the step most beginners rush or get completely wrong. In Day 2 of this 21-Day Amazon KDP Mentorship, I walk you through exactly how to find profitable, low-competition keywords that help your books rank, get discovered, and sell, even if you’re starting from zero.

In this video, you’ll learn how to do proper Amazon KDP keyword research using free tools, how to avoid dead keywords that don’t convert, how to understand buyer intent, and how to validate keywords before writing your book. This step is critical if you want visibility, sales, and long-term results on Amazon.

This tutorial is beginner-friendly and practical; no guesswork, no paid tools required. If your books are not getting impressions or sales, keyword research is often the reason. Watch carefully, apply what you learn, and follow the challenge step-by-step.

📌 Day 3 drops tomorrow by 5:00 PM (Ghana time); don’t miss it.
